org.stekikun.dolmen.unparam

Class Grammar.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.unparam.Grammar.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Grammar

    public static final class Grammar.Builder
extends Object
    A builder class for Grammar, where rules can be added incrementally, and which takes care of collecting problem reports along the way
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer
    See Also:
